item.title: ‘Tiny Hot Dogs’ TV Series Adaptation in Development From Viewpark and Inspired Girl
item.description: A TV adaptation of the novel “Tiny Hot Dogs: A Memoir in Small Bites” is in development at Viewpark and Inspired Girl. Adapted from author Mary Giuliani’s memoir, “Tiny Hot Dogs” is produced by
